1. This is an ordered list item that has multiple characters. Many multiples of characters, in fact. So many, that it looks as though it ought to wrap. More than once. Twice, in fact.

2. This is an ordered list item that has multiple characters. Many multiples of characters, in fact. So many, that it looks as though it ought to wrap. More than once. Twice, in fact.

3. This is an ordered list item that has multiple characters. Many multiples of characters, in fact. So many, that it looks as though it ought to wrap. More than once. Twice, in fact.
